question: Salam, I had a dream that my father died on Eid and also it was my birthday and school was open.
answer:
QUESTION
I had a dream that it was the first day of Eid-Ul-Fitar,and before the Namaz my father somehow died and we didn't pray, atleast i didn't pray Eid's Namaz. People were sad. My uncle and cousin took me to school that wasn't mine but friends and teachers were the same from my school. They had a cake with one candle, I made a wish out loud that I wanted to be with my father but I got scared that wish might come true and I might die or he might come back from Heaven(somehow i was exactly sure that he was in Heaven). After that I cried after every one minute. Then after school I was in Pakistan and was going to my childhood park and on the way i was crying. (please tell me what it means).
ANSWER


Share:
Generally, to see death in one's dream is a reminder of death. It is a
motivation to be conscious of death in order to be straight and upright.

The more conscious a person is of death, the more upright he will be in
fulfilling the orders of Allah Ta'ala.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
